participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, Emily is passionate about her work and her family.
participant_1.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. i am now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Disciplined and resilient, Jake has a strong sense of duty and enjoys reading.
participant_2.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i'm in the army. i did not graduate high school. i live in canada.

content.text: hello, how are you? I just got back from the park. I am a doctor
what are you going to do for a living? I'm looking for new job
what do you do for living? I am looking for job to be a doctor
do you have a favorite movie? mine is friday. I enjoy it
what are your hobbies? I like to read. friday is my favorite
